title: Living in the Shadow
description:
The guys talk about how good it feels to be back in studio. Jay started comedy with Kevin Hart and talks about finding his own lane after seeing him skyrocket to fame, and how Kevin is now also the face of SiriusXM in the new TV commercials.

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire 

Follow us on all social media @TheBonfireXM 

@DanSoder www.DanSoder.com 

@BigJayOakerson www.BigJayComedy.com
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (SiriusXM)
